headline: Founders Behind Martech Cos Rapt (Microsoft) and Krux (Salesforce) Launch Kana with $15M to to Help Marketing Teams Accelerate Growth and Automate Admin Work
summary: ​SAN FRANCISCO, February 18, 2026--​Today, Kana has announced $15 million in seed funding to help marketing teams harness agentic AI with their own data to ignite growth and unlock new efficiencies across their entire operation. Kana’s suite of agents gives marketers and media companies highly configurable, non-disruptive tools to automate workflows, improve decision-making, and adapt to AI-era consumer behavior. headline: G2 Announces 2026 Best Software Award Winners
summary: G2, the world's largest and most trusted software marketplace, today announced the winners of its annual Best Software Awards, which rank the world's best software companies and products based on verified user reviews on G2 and publicly available market presence data. Less than 1% of the over 175,000 vendors listed on G2 earned a placement across this year's lists.

headline: REI Systems Launches REINA AI, a Governed-by-Design AI System for Faster, Defensible Decisions, Now Available on Salesforce AgentExchange

headline: AcuityMD Announces AcuityMD for Salesforce on Salesforce AppExchange
summary: BOSTON, February 18, 2026--AcuityMD today announced it has launched AcuityMD for Salesforce on Salesforce AppExchange, the leading enterprise marketplace for partner apps and experts, empowering customers to integrate AcuityMD’s platform directly with Salesforce to help commercial teams identify opportunities, research and prioritize targets, and hit sales goals faster.

headline: Adobe Stock Drops 26% as Wall Street Questions Its Defense Against AI Competition
summary: Since the start of 2026, Adobe (NASDAQ:ADBE) has plunged 26% as Wall Street questions whether its creative software empire can withstand the generative AI revolution, plunging over 44% from its 52-week high as the market reprices the stock for a world where AI tools commoditize creative work that once required Adobe’s premium software suite. headline: Assessing Salesforce (CRM) Valuation As AI Partnerships Expand And Analyst Support Builds Ahead Of Earnings
summary: Renewed attention on Salesforce (CRM) is being driven by fresh analyst support for its AI roadmap and an expanded collaboration with Asymbl on workforce orchestration. Investors are also looking ahead to the upcoming earnings release. See our latest analysis for Salesforce. Despite the AI-focused contracts, acquisitions and job cuts, Salesforce’s 30 day share price return of 18.85% and year to date share price return of 27.34% decline point to fading momentum.
